# instanceDescriptorBuffer

**Instance Property**

Assigns a reference to a buffer containing instance descriptors for acceleration structures to reference.

## Declaration

```swift
var instanceDescriptorBuffer: MTL4BufferRange { get set }
```

## Discussion

This buffer conceptually represents an array of instance data. The specific format for the structs that comprise each entry depends on the value of the  [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4IndirectInstanceAccelerationStructureDescriptor/instanceDescriptorType] property.

You are responsible for ensuring the buffer address the range contains is not zero.
